mapper.update: UPDATE ted_plan_classroom tpc INNER JOIN ted_classroom tc ON tpc.classroom_id = tc.id SET tpc.enrolled_count = tpc.enrolled_count + 1 WHERE tpc.plan_id = #{planId} AND tpc.classroom_id = #{classroomId} AND tpc.enrolled_count < tc.max_candidates
